name: Froggo' Fast
description:
A 2D Platformer, where you can't stop jumping and need to go fast.

Made for Mini Jam 106: Frogs in 3 days.

CONTROLS
Hold Space to control your jumps.
WASD to move.
Click to tongue grapple.
R to restart.

CREDITS
Code by NickPNiko
Art by Unbreakable
Music by Staintocton
Font (Thaleah Fat)  made by Tinyworlds
Sounds from Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom
